author: Reuters Editorial
title: UAE's ADNOC to announce details of exploration licensing round Tuesday
text:
ABU DHABI (Reuters) - Abu Dhabi National Oil Co (ADNOC) will announce details of its exploration licensing round on Tuesday.
FILE PHOTO: Logos of ADNOC are seen at Gastech, the world's biggest expo for the gas industry, in Chiba, Japan, April 4, 2017. REUTERS/Toru Hanai/File Photo ADNOCâ€™s CEO Sultan al-Jaber is due to hold a press conference at 10:00 local time (0600 GMT) on the exploration round.
Speaking at CERAWeek conference in Houston in March, al-Jaber said the company planned to make unexplored blocks of oil in the UAE available for auction in the near future.
Reporting By Rania El Gamal; Writing By Maha El Dahan
